Malice extended his hand to shake hands, but his gaze fell to his own 
clawed hand.  His memory went back to a time when his hands were just 
like any other Autobots, smooth and soft.  He withdrew his hand and 
said simply:
"We shouldn't let a baby in here.  I have high energy energon in 
here, your baby could contract energon poisoning."
He motioned to the couple that they would continue their conversation 
outside.  Before he left the room, he grabbed a small piece of 
energon to snack on.  He shut the door to his quarters and turned to 
his hosts.
"Sorry, I didn't want your child to get sick on my account." 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus nodded at Malice.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I'm glad to have someone with such experience here...
> 
> Nightlight had come in with Elita. Rodimus stood, gesturing her 
over.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Malice, this is my wife, Nightlight, and our 
daughter, Elita.
> 
>
